data.title: Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort and Spa - Koloa, HI Meeting Venues and Event Space
data.meta_description: The amazing beachfront setting of Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa offers 25,000 sq. ft. of flexible indoor function space & 40,000 sq. ft. of outdoor space for unforgettable events that your attendees will be talking about for years to come.
data.text:
More

Get inspired at Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa. Reflecting the splendor of the island, this resort embodies the true spirit of aloha. Set on 50 acres fronting a white sand beach, the 605-room resort unfolds with a relaxed sense of elegance and classic Hawaiian architecture that embraces Hawaiiâs culture and climate. The resort features lush gardens, manicured lawns, a multi-level pool that includes an adult area, river pool, waterslide and saltwater lagoon. Attendees will appreciate leisure activities that include championship golf at Poipu Bay Resort, former home of the PGA Grand Slam and our award-winning Anara Spa where the open-air garden setting provides the ideal place to relax and unwind. Off-site activities include horseback riding, ziplining, ATV riding, and more. For events, options abound with more than 25,000 square feet of flexible indoor meeting space and 40,000 square feet of breathtaking outdoor venues. Rooms & Suites Relax among the beautiful views of verdant gardens, the sparkling Pacific Ocean or the lush mountainside from the private patio or lanai of your spacious guestroom. Dining Dine at some of the best restaurants on Kauai with inspiring views at Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort & Spa. Dining options abound with five restaurants and lounges offering sushi, American fare and contemporary Hawaiian cuisine. Spa Honoring a culture rooted in the balance and wisdom of nature, Anara Spa in Kauai weaves traditional healing customs to inspire âlokahiâ- balance and harmony of body and spirit. Enjoy one of our blissful massage, facial, or body treatments and experience complete serenity and rejuvenation during your stay. Water Playground Lounge the day away at our award-winning multi-level pools and saltwater lagoon. Float down our lava-rock lined lazy river pool past waterfalls, quiet seating nooks and secret caves to end at our 150-foot waterslide. Whoosh down and play a game of water volleyball or basketball. Or find your niche in our quiet adult pool area. Umbrellas for shade are offered throughout or rent a cabana for shaded privacy. To reserve a cabana, please call 808 240 6495. Our 1.5 acre saltwater lagoon offers a sandy beach replete with islands to swim to. If it's ocean breezes you prefer, Keoneloa Bay/Shipwreck Beach's white sand is just steps away. Championship Golf Sprawled between lush mountains and rugged ocean cliffs, Poipu Bay Golf Course boasts 18 championship holes with seashore paspalum greens that are as visually stunning as they are challenging. Designed by Robert Trent Jones, Jr., Poipu Bay is one of the most highly acclaimed resort courses in the Pacific. From 1994 to 2006, the course played host to the annual PGA Grand Slam of Golf, one of the most prestigious tournaments in the golf world. A round at Poipu Bay Golf Course affords you the opportunity to experience the sheer pleasures and daunting challenges of a course recognized as one of Americaâs finest. Shops The resort features 12,000 square feet of retail shops, featuring Tori Richard aloha wear, Na Hoku fine jewelry, an art gallery, Shoe Envy, Anara Spa boutique, Waterwear, Sunglass Hut, Hawaiiâs own Martin and MacArthur fine woodworking, and gifts and sundries.
